review.title: “very nice work place enviornment”
review.pros: Pros – lots of additional money to be made on weekends working parties. very friendly staff to work with on the job.
review.cons: Cons – there is a lot of pressure on a daily basis as you are responsible for the wedding or other type of party .
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – management should be more sensitive to the people working there during the week when mistakes are made. do look to place blame, look to solve the problem so it doesn't happen again.
